data.title: Great spot, and need to be known...
data.text: After reading all the good reviews posted, my wife and I booked a gift certificate for a friend's birthday. My wife decided to call BRM&S to find out some more infos about their services. She was able to surprisingly talk to the owner and felt so taking care of, that she decided to book two massages on that same day for the both of us. Well let me tell you all, it is all true and worth it... From the ever so welcoming owner David at the reception to the cleanliness of the place without forgetting the very skillfull massage therapists.... It is all there... Thanks to the whole team for making us feels relaxed. We will be back...
